Test.name: Stating main container with successcul authentication.
Test.WhatTest: Tests the authentication of a user while starting a new main container.
Test.HowWorkTest: While starting a new main container, correct user name and password is submitted.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passes, when the main container starts, and fails, when the main container does not start.

Test.name: Stating main container with unsuccesscul authentication.
Test.WhatTest: Tests the authentication of a user while starting a new main container.
Test.HowWorkTest: While starting a new main container, incorrect user name or password is submitted.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passes, when the main container does not start, and fails, when the main container starts.
